summary: A overpowered Demon Follower. Ready to crush your enemies!
descriptionHtml:
[left]His name is Zyrion. His race is nord with vampiric aesthetics. He uses twohanded weapons and the Vampiric Drain Spell. Zyr' can be found inside of Bleak Falls Barrow near the entrance.[/left]
SoS and HDT is needed. If you want this exact version you will have to download those two mods, if not you can exchange his body and skeleton nif with your own. If you don't know hot to do that ask in the comment section.
author: KillingSilence
